it emerged yesterday that 23 MPs repaid IPSA? 12,500 after deciding they had been given too much. IPSA chairman Ian Kennedy told MPs to stop complaining and accept the system. But George Clement Kahama insisted: There are some unsatisfactory features impeding MPs from doing their jobs. IPSA revealed yesterday it had rejected 248 claims worth? 15,000 last September and October. Those snubbed included Cabinet ministers Kenneth Clarke and Chris Huhne .
